main_definition: Guns are weapons that use explosive force to propel projectiles, typically bullets, at high speed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A collection of firearms owned or used by an individual or group
meanings_and_examples.example: The local gun shop has a wide variety of guns for sale.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Meaning to confront someone aggressively, often in reference to weapons usage
meanings_and_examples.example: He threatened the mugger with his fists and guns.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A phrase used as an interjection expressing surprise or shock, similar to 'golly gee' or 'good grief'
meanings_and_examples.example: Guns! I can't believe we missed the deadline by just one day!
